      • Player

        public Player(int[] pos,
              int[] prevPos,
              int[] prevPrevPos,
              Profile profile,
              java.util.List<ActionTile> actionTiles)
        Parameters:
        pos - Player's position on the board
        prevPos - Player's position one turn ago
        prevPrevPos - Player's position two turns ago
        profile - The profile associated with this player
        actionTiles - The action tiles that this player is 'holding'
